column1: Funeral Services for Joy English McWatters will be held at 11:00 a.m.
column4: 2015 in the Cartwright Memorial Chapel of Groveton Funeral Home with Bro. Lester McAdams officiating. Interment will follow in Bennett Cemetery. Visitation for Mrs. McWatters will begin at 10:00 a.m. until service time on Friday
